HediffDef.label: Race: Goblin
HediffDef.description:
Goblins are a small but industrious race, they work faster than most others. Their small stature leaves them generally weaker than others. They are often hard to distinguish at a glance between males and females of the species.
- 120% Global Work Speed
- 50% Psychic Sensitivity
- 90% Health Scale
- 90% Body Size
- 2 Trait Slots

Ascension:
 Can be ascended into a Hobgoblin by an Orc. Ascension requires the races experience bar be filled first, which can be done by having them perform tasks they have a passion in.
